content.raw:
Should msgs1 be installed as `libignition-msgs-dev` instead of `libignition-msgs1-dev`? This is what the pre-release repo seems to indicate:

http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-prerelease/pool/main/i/

Pipelines fails if I try using the pre-release repo with either `*-msgs1-*` or `*-msgs-*`, maybe I'm doing something wrong:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/309
* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/addon/pipelines/home#!/results/310

Should msgs1 be installed as libignition-msgs-dev instead of libignition-msgs1-dev? This is what the pre-release repo seems to indicate:

http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-prerelease/pool/main/i/

Pipelines fails if I try using the pre-release repo with either *-msgs1-* or *-msgs-*, maybe I'm doing something wrong:
